Personal Shield.name: Personal Shield
Personal Shield.desc: Become Invulnerable for a short time.

ult.name: Laser reflection
ult.desc: reflects enemy laser back at them, dealing considerable damage

Mega Bomb.desc: Damages enemies on screen in a large radius

ult.name: Fusion core
ult.desc: Enemies in the charging reticle will receive double damage

Mega Laser.desc: Deals massive damage in a straight line in front of your ship.also destroys bullets.

Teleport.desc: Teleports the ship anywhere on screen

ult.name: Arrival EMP
ult.desc: destroys bullets in a small radius around your ship upon arrival

Reflex EMP.desc: Destroys bullets in a moderate radius around your ship

ult.name: Reflex EMP bomb
ult.desc: deals moderate damage to ships in the radius of the blast

Tracking Minigun.desc: activates a tracking minigun when charged

ult.name: Barrage missiles
ult.desc: shoots homing missiles along with the minigun

Trinity Teleport.desc: shoots a moderate damage projectile upon arrival

ult.name: Arrival EMP
ult.desc: destroys bullets in a small radius around your ship upon arrival
